analysis: The documents in this cluster primarily concern government regulations and directives related to various aspects of national policy, including foreign affairs, national security, labor relations, arts and humanities, and federal procurement. They cover a range of topics such as sanctions against Iran, international monetary policy, intelligence activities, collective bargaining, support for the arts, and domestic manufacturing. The documents aim to establish policies, clarify responsibilities, and improve the efficiency and effectiveness of government operations in these areas.
title: Governmental Directives on National Policy & Regulation
